subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport won her first singles title after almost a year’s absence from the Tour, defeating Daniela Hantuchova, 6-4, 3-6, 6-2, to capture the Bali Open in Nusa Dua, Indonesia. Davenport, 31, was playing her first singles tournament since having a baby in June. She eliminated some strong opponents en route to the title: second-seeded Hantuchova, top-seeded Jelena Jankovic and fifth-seeded Eleni Daniilidou.
